original_title: Bronx: Gun Hill Road (East) - Lurting Avenue
text:
East Gunhill Road (left, not seen), at the S.E. corner of Lurting. The view is in a southeasterly direction, showing an apartment house under construction.

June 1, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.

original_title: Bronx: Gun Hill Road (East) - Lurting Avenue
text:
East Gunhill Road (extreme right), at the S.W. corner of Lurting Ave.
June 1, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.

ASSUMING STREET TO
BE EAST AND WEST
